Package net.kemitix.mon

Class Mon<T>

java.lang.Object
net.kemitix.mon.Mon<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the alias
All Implemented Interfaces:
Functor<T,​Mon<?>>
public class Mon<T> extends Object implements Functor<T,​Mon<?>>
An almost-monad type-alias.
Author:
Paul Campbell (pcampbell@kemitix.net)

    • factory

      public static <T,​ R> Function<T,​R> factory​(@NonNull @NonNull Predicate<T> validator, @NonNull @NonNull Function<Mon<T>,​R> onValid, @NonNull @NonNull Supplier<R> onInvalid)
      Create a factory for creating validated instances.

      The value can never be null.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the value
      R - the type of the factory output
      Parameters:
      validator - the validator function
      onValid - the function to create when valid
      onInvalid - the function to create when invalid
      Returns:
      a function to apply to values to alias

    • flatMap

      public final <R> Mon<R> flatMap​(Function<T,​Mon<R>> f)
      Returns a Mon consisting of the results of replacing the content of this Mon with the contents of a mapped Mon produced by applying the provided mapping function to the content of the Mon.
      Type Parameters:
      R - the type of the result of the mapping function
      Parameters:
      f - the mapping function the produces a Mon
      Returns:
      a Mon containing the result of the function
